content.raw:
Can you please add a `<test_depend>gazebo</test_depend>` to the "servicesim_test/package.xml" file (base on @nuclearsandwich 's finds in #!/osrf/servicesim/pull-requests/41)?

Otherwise LGTM. Puzzled as of why I had everything building and working correctly without this patch though o_O
